search.query: index=_internal log_level!="INFO" component IN (S3Client, StorageInterface, CacheManager, CacheManagerHandler, S2BucketCache, BatchSearch, CursoredSearch, IndexScopedSearch, ISearchOperator) | sort - _time | convert ctime(_time) as time | table time, log_level, component, event_message | rename time AS "Latest Time", log_level as "Log Level", component as Component, event_message as "Event Message"
